name: Quadcopter Go - RC Flight
description:
Quadcopter Go - RC Flight is the epic Drone Battle Championship of remote controlled drones on the great aerial ring. All professional drone warriors arrive to test their strength and fighting skills here. Control your drone and fight against numerous bot warriors.

Drone Battle Championship Rules:

3 LARGE AERIAL LOCATIONS
Fight with drones on various fighting rings

SHORT- AND LONG-RANGE WEAPONS
Equip your drone with powerful arms

HORDES OF BOT DRONES
Exciting fights with numerous bots

Quadcopter Go - RC Flight Features:

Great Drone Battle Championship with lots of participants;
Powerful drone equipment, shot- and long-range arms;
Fights with hordes of artificial intelligence drones;
Chance to become greatest of drone fighters ever.
